Text: It's got english subtitles embedded in it. Don't bother downloading this.
@random_havoc ... so what?! English subs are okay I guess..
use VLC and turn them off Noob, its an MKV file

thanks great upload!
@random_havoc @Nunogod The extension type is .mkv (Matroska Video File) It is like a compressed archive that can contain Video, Audio and Subtitles, By default your Video player will turn on subs but you can always disable them.
